{{Description|The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.}}
'''Adventurer's Tail Feather''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Adventurer]].

==Description==
An adventurer once traveled through a forest in search of rare beasts never seen before.<br />As he tore his way recklessly through the foliage, the adventurer tripped on a tree root.<br />When he regained consciousness, he saw a girl so beautiful that he was willing to give up the adventurer's life to be with her.<br />Her appearance was surreal, with a cluster of feathers adorning her hair.
